title: Gifting doesn't work while Double Legendary Rate
body:
I really like playing with skins, so a friend of mine and me loaded up some rp to spend on mystery gifts while the drop rate for legendaries is doubled, (saw that in worlds screen and in the shop) but then unfortunately this bs: [](http://prntscr.com/8nnb0r) . As you can see, there isn't even the bloody button to purchase the gifts. Fix this before the event ends please.

Best regards,
VayneGretzky

replies.body: I just made a post too. I hope they fix it soon :S
